properties.entry: SELECT count(*) count FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STOCK > 0 AND FCATEGORY_name =?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , PRODUCT_IMG FROM TB_PRODUCT B WHERE STOCK > 0 AND FCATEGORY_NAME = ? ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
